str.o: The SQL tags module provides the tags <tt><sqlquery></tt> and<tt><sqltable></tt> as well as being a source to the <tt><emit></tt> tag (<tt><emit source="sql" ... ></tt>).All tags send queries to SQL databases.

The default database that will be used if no host attribute is given to the tags. The value is a database URL in this format: 

driver://[username[:password]@]host[:port][/database]

If the SQL databases module is loaded, it's also possible to use an alias registered there. That's the recommended way, since this (usually sensitive) data is collected in one place then.
The default database is connected to %s server on %s.
The default database is not connected
If this is defined, it's the database this server will use as the default database
